snippet.title: Anima Flux Steam Release Date Official Trailer - Save Humanity Solo or in Co-op
snippet.description:
The countdown is on—Anima Flux Co-op Metroidvania launches on Steam October 7: https://store.steampowered.com/app/763180/Anima_Flux/?utm_source=yt&utm_campaign=oct1 

Play solo or team up in co-op as two elite soldiers battling mutants in a dystopian space city. Combine abilities, face epic boss fights, and uncover dark secrets along the way! The fate of humanity is in your hands!

Join our Discord for news and updates: https://discord.gg/xpxwzegj9f
